q: In just filed court papers Camille asks a judge to deny Kelsey's request to dissolve their 13 year marriage while they continue battling over their 120 million dollar estate. Camille writes in the court papers, It is my understanding that( Kelsey) is seeking to terminate the marriage solely for the reason that he intends to remarry as soon as possible.`` I don't believe that is a sufficient reason to prejudice my rights to our estate. The Frasier star appeared on the Late Show with David Letterman Thursday night and sounded resolute about his plans for a quickie divorce from Camille, so he can tie the knot with Kayte Walsh soon.

Of late, Sergio Marchionne is sounding increasingly optimistic about Chrysler as its fortunes improve, with U.S. sales rising 17 percent last year. I think our presence in Chrysler could not have been forecast, and certainly in hindsight it was probably one of the best things that could have happened to Fiat, he said last week in Italy.`` I think it is also one of the best things that could have happened to Chrysler, too.'' AP Business Writer Colleen Barry in Milan, Italy, contributed

An uncharacteristically serious David Letterman opens up to Barbara Walters about his open heart surgery in a TV special, A Matter of Life and Death, airing Friday on ABC. Barbara Walters said to David Letterman , You said the surgery was barbaric. `` Well, it it barbaric. Before they wheeled me off I said,' I just don't want to hear the bone saw.''' its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research.
